otherNames: Boogiepop wa Warawanai: Boogiepop Phantom, Boogiepop Never Laughs, Boogiepop Doesn't Laugh, ブギーポップは笑わない Boogiepop Phantom
synopsis: A light in the sky, followed by a strange aura and grisly murders. Each character tells there own connection to the event and to a similar murder spree 5 years ago. All of the different stories are slowly tied together by seemingly minute similarities and the story of Boogiepop is unraveled.
